tool.name: Otu.association
tool.description: Calculate the correlation coefficient for the otus
tool.command:
echo 'otu.association( #if $otu.is_of_type("mothur.relabund"): relabund=$otu #elif $otu.is_of_type("mothur.shared"): shared=$otu #end if #if $label: ,label=${ str($label).replace(",","-") } #end if #if $groups: ,groups=${ str($groups).replace(",","-") } #end if #if $method: ,method=$method #end if #if $metadata: ,metadata=$metadata #end if #if $cutoff: ,cutoff=$cutoff #end if )' | sed 's/ //g' ## mothur trips over whitespace | mothur &&
## move output files to correct destination prefix="$otu" && mv \${prefix%.dat}*.otu.corr . && mv mothur.*.logfile "$logfile"

param.name: otu
param.label: shared,relabund - OTU Shared or Relabund file

param.name: label
param.label: label - OTU Labels
param.help: By default all labels are used

param.name: metadata
param.label: metadata - find the association between the otus and the metadata.

param.name: cutoff
param.label: cutoff - set a pvalue at which the otu will be reported

collection.name: correlations
collection.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: correlation coefficient files per OTU label

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documenation**
The otu.association_ command calculates the correlation coefficient for the otus in a shared_ or relabund_ file.
.. _shared: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Shared_file .. _relabund: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Get.relabund .. _otu.association: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Otu.association
v.1.25.0: Updated to mothur 1.33, added cutoff option
